comment: "Wired communicates well and responds to pitches promptly. Pay is appropriate, although online budgets are leaner than print. Conde Nast Contract contains a questionable do-not-compete clause, which may be unenforceable. Payment is fairly quick, requires registration with payment system. Direct deposit option."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
Solicited pitch (editor asked you to pitch)
Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)
